other_tests.findings: Had a partial response in her depression with better appetite and interest in day-to-day activities.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Over the next 4 weeks, her mood, appetite, and activity level gradually improved. Eventually, she was able to return home and live independently.

other_tests.findings: Received 12 treatments at 2- to 3-day intervals. Reported some short-term memory loss between treatments but cognitive testing revealed no significant long-term memory changes.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Over the next 9 months, her depression completely resolved and she was able to resume complete self-care.
